channel.title: Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!
channel.description: Recent content on Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!

item.title: about
item.description: I’ve 10 years of experience in IT sector with technical background and service in mind. My strength are: GNU/Linux, Cloud Computing and Internet of Things. I like to explore the newest technology innovations like Deep Learning and BigData.

item.title: New start
item.description: My previous web page design was too outdated so I want to start with newest technology. Welcome to my brand new website powered by Hugo!
